column2: More than 50 arrested at Los Angeles protest over Wal-Mart wages LOS ANGELES
column3: Nov 7 More than 50 people demanding better wages for Wal-Mart workers in a protest organized by a union activists were arrested outside the retailer's store in the Chinatown section of Los Angeles on Thursday night.
